channel.title: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things
channel.description:
I am trying to make a packet to handle the clicking of certain items, such as bones, its giving off in the cmd that the packet is unhandled, and the opcode of the bones is 122, so I am making a new packet, what I need is what goes like this, [code] itemId = randomPacketShitIDontUnderstand; slot = Yeah..; [/code] And another thing, I need to figure out npc spawns, I know how to make the classes write a file, and all that, I just need to know where to start, and what classes...
I am using the Hyperion directly from graham, never edited by anyone but me.

item.title: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

These were the things for that

	int interfaceId = packet.getLEShortA();
	int slot = packet.getShortA();
	int id = packet.getLEShort();

Read full topic
item.source: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things

item.title: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Was it something like int itemId = packet.getLEShort() & 0xFFFF;? by any chance?

Read full topic
item.source: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things

item.title: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

EDIT: Nvm I fixed it. Had to go look at another base! I’m off to finish prayer now.

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:13, topic:424388”]I do need help with what to put so that it reads the clicking

like id = packet.getblahblah & 0FxFF

I can’t get it…[/quote]

The structure is in the client. It should however be documented at http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Item_action_1

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:10, topic:424388”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=527044.msg3840894#msg3840894 date=1323216824]
I think the packets are loaded in an XML file.

<packet opcode="122">your.package.here.PacketHandler</packet>

[/quote]
configuration.cfg isn’t it?

[quote]

Hyperion configuration file

world loader

worldLoader: org.hyperion.rs2.GenericWorldLoader

login server

loginServer: localhost

world password

nodePassword: changeme

world id

nodeId: 1

packet handlers

idle packet

packetHandlers[68]: org.hyperion.rs2.packet.IdlePacketHandler

keep alive I’m using this as the “ping packet”.

[/quote][/quote]

Yes that. I thought it was an XML file though. Oh well.

item.title: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:3, topic:424388”]I am going to set up a config file for npc spawns, I just need to know how to create one on the map first, I got the rest,

and with the pack things, I am starting to understand Hyperion’s packets and such more, I have,

	@Override
	public void handle(Player player, Packet packet) {
		switch (packet.getOpcode()) {
		case 122:
			handleItemClick(player, packet);
			break;
		}
		
	}

But when I click a bone or herb or something, the opcode 122 still comes up unhanded.[/quote]
try going to ItemClick.java and make a case that when you click bury on the bone, that it will delete it and say you buried a bone :3

Read full topic
item.source: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things

item.title: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I am going to set up a config file for npc spawns, I just need to know how to create one on the map first, I got the rest,

and with the pack things, I am starting to understand Hyperion’s packets and such more, I have,

	@Override
	public void handle(Player player, Packet packet) {
		switch (packet.getOpcode()) {
		case 122:
			handleItemClick(player, packet);
			break;
		}
		
	}

But when I click a bone or herb or something, the opcode 122 still comes up unhanded.

Read full topic
item.source: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things

item.title: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:1, topic:424388”]I am trying to make a packet to handle the clicking of certain items, such as bones, its giving off in the cmd that the packet is unhandled, and the opcode of the bones is 122, so I am making a new packet, what I need is what goes like this,

itemId = randomPacketShitIDontUnderstand;
slot = Yeah..;

And another thing, I need to figure out npc spawns, I know how to make the classes write a file, and all that, I just need to know where to start, and what classes…

I am using the Hyperion directly from graham, never edited by anyone but me.[/quote]
Idk about the ItemID = randomPacketSHitIDontUnderstand

but slot should = 0
that way it doesn’t look for a certain slot the item is in.
and what do you mean to figure out npc spawns. do you want to place an npc somewhere or what?

Read full topic
item.source: [Hyperion] Need help with a few things
